sentences.en: Our survival is inextricably linked to the survival of the rainforest.
sentences.cn: 我们的生存与雨林的生存息息相关。

sentences.en: They do serious harm to tropical rainforest.
sentences.cn: 他们对热带雨林造成严重危害。

sentences.en: Low-level slash and burn farming doesn't harm rainforest.
sentences.cn: 低水平的刀耕火种不会损害雨林。
